data.title: 12 Bollywood Celebrities And Their Link-Ups With Foreigners
data.meta_description: They are famous, they are rich and they live in the lap of luxury. Today's celebrities have everything going for them in every sense. But when it comes to
data.text:
They are famous, they are rich and they live in the lap of luxury. Today celebrities have everything going for them in every sense. But when it comes to dating, some of them have a rather firangi choice. From dating to marriage to divorces, they have been there done that, but the firangi way. So, here are 12 Bollywood celebrities who have either dated or married foreigners.

advertisement

Recommended Read: Top 11 Actresses Who Happily Chose Their Families Over Making A Career In Bollywood

#1. Salman Khan and Iulia Vantur

advertisement

advertisement

Salmanâ€™s love for foreigners is no secret. And presently, he is rumoured to be dating Romanian television anchor Iulia Vantur. It is also believed that the two might tie the knot sometime soon this year.

#2. Sushmita Sen and Wasim Akram

advertisement

Image Courtesy: Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena

While the two were hosting a television show called Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena together, there were rumours of former Miss Universe and actress Sushmita Sen and Pakistani cricketer Wasim Akram being in a relationship. Even though Sushmita rubbished the rumours saying that they were baseless, the facts suggested otherwise.

Do Read: 4 Times Sushmita Sen Proved Why Being Single Is The Best Thing That Can Happen To You

advertisement

#3. Saif Ali Khan and Rosa Catalano

After being married to actress Amrita Singh for 14 years, and being a father of two children, Saif cheated on his wife when he openly started dating Italian model Rosa. While that affair did not last long, he is now married to actress Kareena Kapoor.

advertisement.

#4. Kangana Ranaut and Nicolas Lafferty

Even though she was never very public about her relationships, Kangana was seen hanging out and spending a lot of time with English doctor Nicolas Lafferty. But after dating only for a short while, they broke up in 2012.

advertisement

advertisement

Did you know Kangana Ranaut dated actor Hrithik Roshan secretly? Read: 8 Real Life Bollywood Couples Who Refuse To Accept Their Relationship Publicly

#5. Aamir Khan and Jessica Hines

Yes, you read it right, Mr. Perfectionist Aamir was supposedly dating British journalist Jessica whom he met on the sets of Ghulam. If rumours are to be believed, then the two also had a child together which Aamir obviously did not agree to.

ADVT.

#6. Amrita Arora and Usman Afzaal

advertisement

Actress Amrita, who is now married to businessman Shakeel Ladak and is a proud mommy to two children, earlier dated Pakistan-born English cricketer, Usman Afzaal for four years.

Recommended Read: Indian Cricketer Ravindra Jadeja Gets An Audi Car As A Wedding Gift From His Father-In-Law

advertisement

#7. Celina Jaitely and Peter Haag

Former Miss India and actress Celina Jaitely not only dated, but also married Australian businessman Peter Haag. They are now proud parents to twin boys.

#8. Neena Gupta and Vivian Richards

advertisement

The much married Vivian Richards dated actress Neena Gupta for quite some time, and the two also had a love child, Masaba together. And because he was already married, he never married Nina. Their daughter Masaba is a well-known Indian fashion designer now.

Don't Miss: 13 Unseen Pictures Of Masaba Gupta And Madhu Mantena's Wedding

#9. Madhu Sapre and Gian Maria

advertisement

After dating Miland Soman for some time, supermodel Madhu Sapre found love and companionship in Italian businessman Gian Maria, whom she married in 2000. The two have a daughter named Indira and are settled in Italy.

#10. Kabir Bedi and Susan Humphreys

Image Courtesy: Indian Express

Actor Kabir Bedi, who has been married four times now, married British fashion designer Susan who was his second wife. He recently got married to his girlfriend of 10 years Parveen Dosanj.

advertisement

Also know about Kabir Bedi's fourth marriage at 70: Kabir Bedi Gets Married At 70, Daughter Pooja Bedi Calls His New Wife, 'Evil Stepmother'

#11. Milind Soman and Mylene Jampanoi

He dated Madhu Sapre for a few years, but that did not work out. Later, he met Mylene, who was his co-actor. She is half French half Chinese. But unfortunately, they got divorced three years later.

#12. Priyanka Chopra and the mystery man

Yes, you heard that right. We do not know exactly who he is, but some time back, there were rumours that the lead Quantico actress was dating her co-star in the USA. We do not know how much of that is true. But then there is no smoke without fire, is there?

Recommended Read: 6 Bollywood Couples Who Left Us Shocked With Their Breakups In 2016

Yesteryear actors like Shashi Kapoor too has done it when he married his foreigner co-star Jennifer Kendal, who later died. And now, it seems like the youngsters seem to be following that legacy which their seniors left.
